name: Abdul Rafay
title: Software Engineer
headline: Full-stack Software Engineer
summary: Full-stack Software Engineer with internship experience in web, mobile, and backend development. Proficient in .NET, Flutter, C++, Python, and MERN stack. Skilled in writing clean, maintainable code and following Agile and DevOps practices. Eager to grow in a dynamic, real-world environment.

work_experience.title: Intern
work_experience.description: Developed and deployed cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart, Implemented responsive UI designs with custom animations and transitions, Integrated Firebase Authentication, Cloud Firestore, and Realtime Database for seamless backend operations and data synchronization, Constructed RESTful API interfaces to connect with external services, Utilized Git for version control and implemented CI/CD pipelines

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (BSCS)

projects.title: SOW Parts App
projects.description: Developed a cross-platform system for automotive parts procurement, Built a responsive web portal using Next.js, Designed a React Native mobile app, Implemented a robust backend using NestJS and MySQL

projects.title: Homeschooling Resource Hub
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive platform to manage and distribute homeschooling resources, Designed age-, class-, and region-based categorization, Built a dual-interface system with an admin dashboard

projects.title: SBMTech Cybersecurity Consultancy Website
projects.description: Built a responsive, multi-page consultancy website using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, Integrated real-time cybersecurity news feeds and dynamic service pages

projects.title: Banking Application
projects.description: Developed a headless banking system using ASP.NET Core Web API and Blazor WebAssembly, Implemented database-first integration with SQL Server via Entity Framework Core

projects.title: FLEX System: University Academic Management Platform
projects.description: Developed a robust database management system to streamline academic operations, Implemented features for student enrollment, course registration, timetable scheduling, and performance tracking
